Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Benilde V. De Roa
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, I use this cellphone in VENEZUELA, with  telefonica movistar and it works great. It works in 3G and 2G (EDGE) very well.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Jhonatan
Reviews.Content: Equipo nuevo, la batería le dura todo el día, fue despachado a tiempo, en Venezuela agarra 3G con Digitel y 2G con Movilnet y movistar... Recomendado...

Reviews.Title: Upgrade from 8520 Curve
Reviews.Author: Nadia
Reviews.Content: I was searching for a phone of slightly better caliber after having two 8520's.  I chose the 9320 as I am a believer in reading reviews and saw it had a good track record.  I was not disappointed.  It keeps me organized and everything comes straight to my phone which is very convenient (and a bit annoying).  Takes really good quality pictures (thanks to the flash) and has a very user friendly layout.  I am definitely going to have to source a case as it is quite light weight as compared to a 8520 and is more prone to accidents.  I like the look and it really serves its purpose.  Good buy.  Comes with a 2GB memory card though so beware of that.  the head phones have good sound and it comes with the USB/charger, installation CD and instructions.

Reviews.Title: Very nice phone, good battery, 3G but with not good screen
Reviews.Author: AyanD
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for a gift for my father. I like the phone. This is not IOS or Android or not even touch, but it is a blackberry and very nice blackberry. Probably it has the best battery among all blackberry phones. Very fast BB 7 OS and my father is using 3G in India (Vodafone) by this phone which is really really running fast. Phone itself is good looking, easy to handle, okay call quality, okay camera and has a costly feel. But I am disappointed with the display. It is a small display which is okay, but at the same time it is low resolution even for the smaller screen. I am taking one rating off for that.

Reviews.Title: telefono de segunda mano
Reviews.Author: joel colmenarez
Reviews.Content: el celular es de segunda mano, fue reconstruido y el sello de garantía esta violentado, tiene muchos defectos. quede muy decepcionado de esta tienda tendré mas cuidado a escoger la tienda a la cual haré mis compras...

Reviews.Author: Alexis Pantoja
Reviews.Content: Soy de Venezuela, tuve retraso con la empresa que transportaba a Venezuela el telefono pero ya me llegó. Este telefono es una maravilla, con Digitel levanta 3G, solo tuve un detalle, el convertidor de corriente que me enviaron es más pequeño y no coincide con el cargador de tres puntas; motivo por el cual me veo obligado a comprar un convertidor o cargador aqui en Venezuela.  Del resto todo bienI'm from Venezuela, the company had delay Venezuela carrying the phone but I arrived. This phone is great, with up Digitel 3G, just had a breakdown, the power converter they sent is smaller and does not match the three-prong charger, which is why I have to buy a converter or charger here in Venezuela. The rest all good

Reviews.Title: Great customer service, but phone was not great
Reviews.Author: Heather Capko
Reviews.Content: My two stars are for the Blackberry itself.  However, I give five stars to Global Distributing for their outstanding customer service.  I recieved the phone quickly, but began having issues with the battery.  I would get a screen showing a battery with the red 'x' through it.  After emailing Global Distribuing, they sent me a replacement battery free of charge.  About three months later, I get the screen of death, again.  I had to contact the seller about three times, about this happening, and each time they sent me free replacement batteries.  Well, it has happened,again.  In addition to battery issues, there is also dust and lint collecting under the screen making it aggravating to view the phone.  Again, Global Distributing has been awesome, but Blackberry is NOT a good product.  I would order a different brand,

Reviews.Content: it's as described, i recommend this phone. i really like it, the seller is reliable 100%, also it is a high quality product.

Reviews.Title: Sweet compact BB with modern OS
Reviews.Author: L. Fereday
Reviews.Content: This is a well built compact BB that is very usable.  Ideal for people with small hands looking for a BB.  It's fast and responsive.  Build quality is "like the good ol'd days"

Reviews.Title: Wrong Battery
Reviews.Author: Toniann
Reviews.Content: I ordered 3 of these phones for my aunt in Trinidad and when they arrived early I was happy. Everything was packaged and sealed neatly and nothing looked like it was missing. However, when I went to put the battery in one of the phones, it was half the size of the actual battery compartment of the phone. Upon looking at the other two phones, it turns out that non of them had the right battery!!!! When I called I was told they can't replace the battery and I had to either send it back or keep it. I sent that back and got ALL of my money returned!

Reviews.Title: Very Dissapointed.

Reviews.Content: Very bad experience. One of the phones didn't work. It didn turn on. I need to return it. I brouht to Venezuela. As soon as a go back to LA Ill return it. Very dissapointed

Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Content: Its a great cellphone, it is not the last generation but it is all what i need, thanks you :

Reviews.Title: Decent, but the 9900 is worth the price. NOT A NEW PHONE from seller "BREED"
Reviews.Author: Tyler Newberry
Reviews.Content: Let me just start out by telling you that the seller I ordered from (BREED) listed this item as "new", not LIKE NEW but actually "NEW"  and it was actually refurbished. The phone had dust under the screen and came in a strange (probably fake) box without a berry symbol next to the logo type. All the accessories were new and included though.CARRIERI have AT&T; in the U.S. and the phone was unlocked and clean (no carrier info/settings) so manually programming the phone was difficult, even with AT&T;'s help. Nonetheless, it did work very well on AT&T;'s network and it had very fast data speeds. The call quality was very clear and SMS was like clockwork.HARDWAREThe phone itself worked well, everything was sturdy and felt very new. The speaker is very loud and clear, the display is decently sized and of good resolution.COMPLAINTSThe only big complaint I had was the keyboard. I'm 6'2" and 270lbs. I'm a pretty big guy. I have decently big hands and the keyboard was near impossible to type on. Other than that, the phone is good but BEWARE OF SELLERS CALLING IT "NEW" if it's not.I ended up returning this phone for the 9900/9930 Bold Touch though. Bigger screen, bigger buttons, faster, but sacrifice of battery life. that's all.

Reviews.Content: 1. They say it's a new phone, but they send an old looking, opened phone. All accessories inside are opened.2. I gifted it to my sister in India-so I left the phone behind -I got back here to the US -and within a day she tells me it's not working! I can't return it -though it is one month of its purchase -nor can I use it!THIS IS SOO EMBARRASSING AND SOOO ANNOYING! I would never buy from them again!

Reviews.Content: I love having a keyboard on my blackberry gives me more (big fingers) control typing messages. I have always like Blackberry for many reasons including emails and text messaging software. I am a die hard Blackberry users and its hard to let go. I have gone from Iphone3, Iphone4, and Galaxy3 but Blackberry has the keyboard that the others just don't have. I like the keyboard the touch screens are harder for me to use. I just wish that there were more apps written for Blackberry (limited at best.)

Reviews.Title: Just a regular phone-its just a blackberry
Reviews.Author: Mahurney Augier
Reviews.Content: I give it a 4 because it is just a normal phone. It is great for exchanging BBM messages using a data plan and for.making and receiving calls. It alxo has good quality video and graphics and the sound quality is quite qood for a blackberry. What I am disappointed about is that the wifi does not seem to work independently instead the phone attempts to access the internet through a data plan from the network service provider. I would recommend this phone if one is looking for a phone to use with a data plan but then again it might be less costly to purchase it form the service provider with the plan. However it is so till a good phone.

The phone came without an user's  manual, and since it has new more features, I will have to get the manual (I hope) via internet.It has a better resolution screen but the icons are too small and up to now I have not fouund how to enlarge them (I have had the new BB for three days)

Reviews.Title: The chamber does not focus
Reviews.Author: gberardi
Reviews.Content: My cellular one in all the aspects was a marvellous purchase, nevertheless, I am very disappointed by the chamber of the equipment, since the chamber there is no way of which it focuses correctly when I try to take a photo closely to any object. I had before 8520 and the photos taken closely were working out simply perfect, on the other hand with 9320 it is a total disaster, the photos work out blurry. Lamentably I was late a lot of time in noticing from this problem to the supplier, for what the alone supplier said to me that the guarantee had expired. I do not know if it is a proble in all the 9320 or it was that mine villain came, but if it could move back the time, he was not buying cellular this one. I am from Venezuela and it worked very well with Movistar.--------------------Mi celular en todos los aspectos fue una estupenda compra, sin embargo, estoy muy decepcionado con la cámara del equipo, pues la cámara no hay manera de que enfoque correctamente cuando intento tomar una foto de cerca a cualquier objeto. Yo tenía antes un 8520 y las fotos tomadas de cerca salían simplemente perfectas, en cambio con el 9320 es un total desastre, las fotos salen borrosas. Lamentablemente tardé mucho tiempo en advertir de este problema al proveedor, por lo que el proveedor solo me dijo que la garantía había expirado. Desconozco si es un proble en todos los 9320 o fue que el mío vino malo, pero si pudiera retroceder el tiempo, no comprara este celular. Soy de Venezuela y funcionó muy bien con Movistar.

Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife and it's been working very well! she loves it, it's very light and fast compare with the one she had before. the camera it's very good and the 3G works fine.Soy venezolano y este telefono me funciona muy buen con movistar, solo tuve que colocarle la sim y ya. 100% recomendado.

Reviews.Title: excelente producto

Reviews.Title: Great product, works on Perú!
Reviews.Author: Narayan
Reviews.Content: I was very worried this blackberry wouldn't work on my country. After coming back to Perú, I've turned on and works just fine with Claro carrier, so far no concerns.

Reviews.Title: light, easy on the hands
Reviews.Author: Orien
Reviews.Content: So far so good. I like the processing speed. Speaker quality is superb. I've only had it a week and it's been great.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Renae Juravle
Reviews.Content: Blackberry so far is working very well. It did appear to be new as advertised. Biggest problem with the product was that it came with a UK power adaptor rather than a US. I dont believe this was specified in the product description, but considering the retailers dont ship outside of the us, the power cord provided to charge the phone is effectively useless without also then purchasing a converter. But otherwise, phone is working good!

Reviews.Title: Good Basic Blackberry
Reviews.Author: Liveaight
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived intact, sealed with all accessories. No Memory card though. Its working well with the airtel network here in Zambia. I ordered another one for my wife from BREED. I hope they remain consistent. This product is amazon fulfilled so amazon is involved in the delivery process... The phone arrived on time. I'm really enjoying it so far. I will update if need be.It streams seamlessly from youtube. Browser not very different from previous curves... still quite slow. Am looking for a 3rd party browser to use instead. No major complaints otherwise. It looks good and feels good. For the price, Its a really good deal.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Technical Details
Reviews.Author: Pedro R. Rodriguez Carrillo
Reviews.Content: In the Technical details it says it supports UMTS 2100/1900/850/800 MHz when it does not, I bought this cellphone trusting in the description of the item. And it doesn't work at 100% in my carrier

Reviews.Title: no me gusto el vendedor
Reviews.Author: Maryory Paredes
Reviews.Content: Muy decepcionada con el trato que me fue dado pOrque aparte de que el telefono no sirvio yo tuve que pagar las consecuencias y aparte me reembolsaron solo una parte del dinero.. No estoy conforme para nada

Reviews.Title: phone without unlocking
Reviews.Author: sergio de los santos
Reviews.Content: the quipo this good only to buy it because he said I was handed desbloquedo locked and therefore I have to pay extra for it to be unlocked

Reviews.Title: The screen wasnt working
Reviews.Author: Alejandro
Reviews.Content: this cellphone came defective, I had to return it, this blackberry was for my uncle and he couldn't even use it... I don't know why they sold the electronic device already damaged

Reviews.Title: Buen Producto
Reviews.Author: Moicam. Venezuela
Reviews.Content: El telefono es bueno.... le coloque mi SIM movilnet y funcionó al momento.... el envío a mi casillero fue rápido... considero que el vendedor cumple con lo ofertado, por lo cual lo recomiendo para proximas compras..!

Reviews.Title: Restarts automatically...and sometimes ERROR 102
Reviews.Author: Karumbaiah Belliappa Pattada
Reviews.Content: We got this international unlocked (no warranty) version. The phone restarts automatically, and reaches a point where it restarts so often that there is now way you can stop it, unless you figure out how to enter into safe mode and then after removing all apps and keeping just the BBM, the restarting problem stopped. However it does throw an error (i think 102) every now and then.Otherwise i am a BB fan, but i heard many people have this restarting problem, but usually not when it's new...

Reviews.Title: Trustworthy Purchase
Reviews.Author: K.P
Reviews.Content: Initially I was hesitant over buying phone online since this was first time I was buying phone which they say is unlocked for my usage with existing AT&T; US account. But the item arrived with unlock code printed on it, which worked good enough. So I got it unlocked as they say it.Phone condition is also excellent. It looks just brand new. Works well.Trust these guys - Tailwind International, they are awesome, Also they reply to your questions well in good time.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Nelson Escalona "Very Happy"
Reviews.Content: I have no words to describe this excellent purchase. This guys do their work very well. I bought this phone for use it in Venezuela with Movilnet service and it's working fine. Very fast delivery and no trouble at all.

Reviews.Title: Happy with Choice
Reviews.Author: Antonia
Reviews.Content: I needed a fairly reasonably priced smartphone as my budget was only $200. At 3G and with more features than my previous phone i feel i got great value for my money.My only suggestion would be for the seller to email the buyer once the phone has been purchased advising that the passcode to the unlocked phone is on the box. The box was tossed immediately because i was not informed of this.

Reviews.Title: Excelente Producto Comprado Desde Venezuela

Reviews.Content: El teléfono llego en excelentes condiciones, totalmente nuevo, funciona perfectamente con DIGITEL que es la operadora que yo uso. Muy bueno

Reviews.Content: Very good phone...only fault was that it didnt come with a memory card. But overall very nice and small..It's a goooo.....:)

Reviews.Title: Excelente.

Reviews.Content: Muy buen producto, estoy muy contenta con lo que he recibido, excelente calidad y ha llegado muy rápido. Estoy satisfecha.

Reviews.Title: The requested item was not as it features shown in proposal
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: good evening, gentlemen amazon, I am not satisfied with the order placed, given that it was not received as requested and agreed in the purchase executed. Article was asked desbloquiado and was sent a model with telus sim card and did not meet the requirements requested. generandome problems to make use of this service and which supports my Paiz, I hope this is coorregido and fulfill the agreements of the orders sought are as is as specified in the sale. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Fake bb

Reviews.Content: This phone is not real. Fake phone. It still works fine (well it has so far) but it is fakeeee

Reviews.Content: This product are very good, I like and meets the expectations and specifications described in the data sheet, I recommend the product, small cost and big quality

Reviews.Content: I bought these phones by believing that they were new, they were received in Venezuela with the sealed box but came without a  hearing aid and they work not only in 3G, works in 2G i feel cheated because in Amazon say that they were new and working in all the bands

Reviews.Title: buena tecnologia

Reviews.Content: moderno,buena tecnologia, facil de uso, liviano, nuevo de paquete y conectividad inmediata cumple con todas las espectativas que el comprador tiene

Reviews.Author: Miguel Abreu
Reviews.Content: En la pagina de este articulo se lee que el mismo viene desbloqueado y es falso, no lo pude utilizar para ninguna operadora de nuestro paisy para regresarlo no reembolsan el 100% del articulo

Reviews.Title: No funciona con operadora en Venezuela
Reviews.Author: María Naranjo
Reviews.Content: No recomiendo comprar a este vendedor. Luego de dos meses llegó el teléfono a Venezuela, por los acostumbrados retrasos de los Courier, luego de tanta espera nos encontramos con que el teléfono no levanta señal. Cuando le escribí al vendedor, sólo me envió un m automático diciendo que el tiempo de devolución había expirados. NO COMPREN A ESTE VENDEDOR.

Reviews.Title: Modelo Diferente
Reviews.Author: Lorenzo Nieves "Loro"
Reviews.Content: Las caracteristicas del producto indicaban 3G UMTS 2100/1900/850/800 MHz. Probe con mi linea Movilnet la cual trabaja en Venezuela 3G en la banda 1900 MHz, muestra red EDGE al parecer no trabaja con las bandas indicadas en la descripcion. No estoy satisfecho con el producto a pesar de me llego en perfectas condiciones.

Reviews.Title: mas información
Reviews.Author: Luis Hidalgo
Reviews.Content: quiero mas información de mi producto. cuando llega a Venezuela realice 2 compras el 3 de enero cuando me llega

Reviews.Title: question
Reviews.Author: NICOLAS ANTONIO CARRILLO
Reviews.Content: good night when I put the chip gsm phone asks me my MEP code when you put the box indicating I did not want to know how to accept

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 9320 Excellent team, but in the mid-range smartphones
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: Blackberry 9320 Excellent team, In the mid-range SmartphoneThe 3.2MP camera features, is of very low quality, the ability to send voice notes with the side button (BBM) does not work, and if you want Reuter mode on your phone you should consider the issue of  to raise 3G to do so ... If you are in 2G will automatically disable this featureEverything else was excellent, low cost ....Accept that and blackberry is dying or died ... my next smartphone will Samgung Galaxy Note 2 or S3 ..

Reviews.Title: Pregunta
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: Buenas. Alguien pudiera decirme cuanto es el procesador de este equipo? y porque lo venden No Warranty?Gracias y espero me ayuden por favor....

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM 2G 850/900/1800/1900 MHz, 3G bands UMTS 800/850/1900/2100 MHz or 900/1700/2100 MHz, depending on the cellphone version. Check the description in seller condition or ask seller.
3.2 MP Camera with LED Flash; Video Recording; Wi-Fi; MP3 and MP4 Player; 3.5mm Ear Jack; microSD up to 32 GB; Bluetooth; Optical Trackpad; QWERTY Keypad; SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email, IM and Social Networking.
BlackBerry OS 7.0; GPS with A-GPS support; HTML Browser; Internal Memory 512 MB storage, 512 MB RAM; Speed HSDPA, 7.2 Mbps; HSUPA and Document Viewer.
1450 mAh removable/rechargeable lithium-ion battery (J-S1) - Talk time: up to 7 hours; Standby time: up to 18 days
Big and bright screen display: QVGA 320x240 resolution, 164 ppi, Transmissive TFT LCD, 2.44-Inch (measured diagonally)
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry 9320 Curve Unlocked GSM Quad-Band Smartphone with 3.2 MP Camera, Wi-Fi, GPS and 7.1 Blackberry OS - No Warranty - Black
